product_name: FalconGuides Hiking the Selway-Bitterroot Wilderness - 2nd Edition
long_description: If you're looking for the wilds of the northwest without the crowds, Hiking the Selway-Bitterroot Wilderness is the book to get you deep into beautiful Montana and Idaho backcountry.
short_description: If you're looking for the wilds of the northwest without the crowds, Hiking the Selway-Bitterroot Wilderness is the book to get you deep into beautiful Montana and Idaho backcountry.
